SA08bsa007_u:524: tadyathā - savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhamiti prathamadhyānam /
SA08bsa007_u:839_1: abhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pluto 'rddhaplutaḥ sarvāstānapluto dṛṣṭadharmasamaḥ kāyasākṣī khaṅgaśceti //
SA08bsa007_u:841: katamat? tadyathā - idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamanuśrutya teṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasiṃgavataḥ(?)
SA08bsa007_u:845: ityekaparicatakaḥ 1 idaṃ duḥkhamārya sa tatra khalvabhijñātaṃ iti bhikṣavaḥ /
SA08bsa007_u:847: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatvaṃ tava khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
SA08bsa007_u:849: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhaāryyasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya śākṣāt kartavyamiti hitya dvitīyaḥ /
SA08bsa007_u:850: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhaāryasatya tatra khalu bhijñāya śākṣāt dvitīya /
SA08bsa007_u:852: idaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāmini pratipa ityāryyasatyaṃ tatra khalu bhijñāya bhāvayitavyamiti hi bhikṣava ityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
SA08bsa007_u:859: pūrvamanuśrutya teṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasigavataḥ cakṣurudapādi /
SA08bsa007_u:862: ityekaparivartaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti hi bhikṣavaḥ /
SA08bsa007_u:867: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tava khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hītyādi tṛtīyam //
SA08bsa007_u:868: tathā idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyamiti hi pratyekaḥ //
SA08bsa007_u:869: idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣāt kartavyamiti hityādi /
SA08bsa007_u:871: idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣāt kṛtamiti dvitīyaḥ /
SA08bsa007_u:874: ityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya bhātavyamiti hi bhikṣavaḥ ityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
SA08bsa007_u:879: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasikurvataḥ cakṣurudapādi jñānamudapādi vidyodapādi bhūrirudapādītyekaṃ parivartakam /
SA08bsa007_u:880: idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti hi (me)
SA08bsa007_u:881: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasikurvata iti dvitīyam /
SA08bsa007_u:882: idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti bhikṣavaḥ ityādi pūrvavaditi tṛtīyam //
SA08bsa007_u:884: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya prahātavyamiti dvitīyam /
SA08bsa007_u:885: ] idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hītyādi tṛtīyam /
SA08bsa007_u:887: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣātkartavyamiti hītyādi dvitīyam /
SA08bsa007_u:888: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtamiti tṛtīyam //
SA08bsa007_u:890: iyaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāminī pratipadityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhivijñāya bhāvayitavyamiti hi bhikṣava ityādi dvitīyam /
SA08bsa007_u:891: [idaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāminī pratipadityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya bhāvitamiti tṛtīyam // ]
SA08bsa007_u:1082: bhavati na ca bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
SA08bsa007_u:1083: naiva bhavati na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt /
